title: Я знаю, кто тебя убил
overview: A three-year-old girl is kidnapped in a Moscow circus. The kidnapper does not need a ransom, he is driven by a thirst for revenge. He will make his parents suffer the way he himself suffers, having lost his only loved one. They will never know who punished them. To understand what he is taking revenge for, you need to go to the past.
